title: Podly: The Peacemaker Podcast
overview: An HBO Max podcast for the Peacemaker show created by James Gunn. Hosts Ify Nwadiwe and Fiona Nova are here to guide you through the official, fan-driven companion podcast for HBO Max and DC's Peacemaker. They'll be sure to recap every laugh out loud moment, every kick ass action scene, and every tug on the heartstrings. And they'll be talking to some of the cast and creatives behind the show!
